Natural Wonders.name: Earth's Echoes
Natural Wonders.description: Delve into the fundamental processes and creatures that shape our planet. This quiz explores basic ecological concepts and the fascinating wildlife that calls Earth home. Test your knowledge of life's building blocks and the animals that roam wild.

questions.text: What is produced during photosynthesis?
questions.hint: This gas is essential for animal life and released by plants as a byproduct.

questions.text: What kind of animal is a peregrine?
questions.hint: This creature is known for its incredible speed, especially when diving.

questions.text: On average, what length of time passes between high tides?
questions.hint: This interval is influenced by the lunar cycle, occurring roughly twice a day.

questions.text: Which of these rocks will float in water?
questions.hint: This rock is porous and lightweight due to its volcanic origin.

questions.text: On what continent can you find tigers in the wild?
questions.hint: This continent is home to diverse wildlife, including the Bengal tiger.
